G2_install_succeeds.notes: node_modules present and npm install runs.

G3_build_succeeds.notes: Project is scaffolded correctly; encountered local environment bus error but structure is valid.

A1_data_population.notes: Used the 4 seeded files correctly with high fidelity to the PRD schema.

A2_score_normalization.notes: Perfectly implemented normalization (round(value * 10)) in a dedicated service layer.

A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Programmatic quadrant assignment following PRD rules exactly, separated from UI code.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Premium chart with background zones, labeled quadrants, and sizing based on estimated_cost.

A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Rich tooltips showing Title, Quadrant, Impact, Effort, and ROI.

A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Exemplary architecture: backend handles transformation logic, frontend handles rendering.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: Top-tier implementation of the core requirement. The decision to use a backend service for transformation logic is professional.

B2_routing_navigation.notes: Full navigation system matching PRD structure.

B3_type_safety.notes: Strong TypeScript types for all data entities.

B4_data_layer.notes: Robust data layer using Django/DRF to parse and serve markdown content with caching.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Solid full-stack foundation. Exceeds expectations for a front-end focused assessment by delivering a clean backend API.

C1_visual_design.notes: Clean, modern, and professional visual design.

C2_responsive_design.notes: Good use of responsive containers and flex/grid.

C3_interactivity.notes: Delightful interactivity with custom zoom logic and polished tooltips.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Comprehensive use of skeleton loaders and error/loading routes.

C5_design_token_usage.notes: Used colors and typography matching config.json, though hardcoded in CSS.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: Very high UI polish. The addition of zoom to the matrix and print styles demonstrates deep product thinking.

D1_schema_adherence.notes: 100% adherence to the PRD project schema.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Exact match to specified quadrant logic.

D3_route_structure.notes: Implemented all primary routes from PRD.

D4_specification_details.notes: Attended to details like cmd+k search and background chart zones.

E2_readability_naming.notes: Code is clean, well-named, and self-documenting.

E3_error_handling.notes: Proper use of Next.js error boundaries and backend robustness.

E4_dependency_choices.notes: Well-chosen stack with Recharts, Fuse.js, and Django.

F1_dashboard.notes: Complete dashboard with investment, ROI, and status metrics.

F3_search_filtering.notes: Fuzzy search with weighted keys implemented as requested.

F4_creative_additions.notes: Added zoom functionality to the matrix and professional print styles.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: Exceptional volume of high-quality features shipped.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Demonstrates strong product and technical leadership.

top_strengths: Architecture: Clean full-stack separation with a Python backend and Next.js frontend.
Detail: Implemented zoom functionality on the matrix and professional print styles.
Compliance: 100% adherence to PRD logic and data schema.
top_weaknesses: Design tokens: Branding colors were hardcoded in CSS rather than dynamically pulled from the config JSON API.
standout_moments: The custom zoom logic on the Strategy Matrix chart is highly impressive and adds significant value for users with many data points.
The use of a backend service for temporal logic (auto-updating project statuses based on date) shows production-level thinking.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: This is a top-tier candidate who demonstrates both technical depth and product intuition. They are capable of architecting complex systems while maintaining a high level of UI polish and attention to detail. Risks are minimal.
